text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar I hope you keep him on to prove that the Media lies. I also would love to see this country open. I had the Covid-19 last November. I am still alive, still can't taste anything, still have a head ache. Oh wait the headache is from all the Hype and lies about this illness.
